This course is designed for students who intend to understand the principles of the Fair Trade Act by case studies, and who is interested to learn about emerging technology monopoly issues.

name.zh: 專利佈局與專利策略專題研究
name.en: Seminar on Patent Portfolio and Patent Strategy

description.zh: 專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出五十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利範圍解讀開始，熟悉專利的權利範圍，然後介紹專利策略以及佈局的方向，提供專利佈局與專利策略理論及實務經驗。本課程的綱要如下： 1.專利權利項解讀 2.專利侵權分析流程 3.專利迴避設計要件 4.專利策略分析 5.專利佈局實務 6.案例研究
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around. In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies. However, in practice, they perform much less. That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty. This course will start from patent claim interpretation, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies. The outline of this course is given as follows: Patent claim interpretation; Process of patent infringement analysis; Requirements of patent design around; Patent strategy analysis; Practice on patent strategies; and Study on patent cases.

description.zh: 具有好的設計構想並不容易，因為它真的挑戰是靠實際地去執行它的創新策略及內涵。而設計創新專案面臨日趨專業及複雜化之趨勢，相對地優質的產品創新已不容許次級產品的存在空間。設計管理者必須運用前瞻具差異的眼光主動發展並整合專案內外多元專業之資源，並以品牌行銷的策略為前導，規劃並有效地管理專案。本課程重點：1.	以品牌行銷為導向之創新管理的架構與多元專業之定位。2.	有關知識與技巧之準則。3.	創新專案之規劃、組織、推行與監督。
description.en: Having good product ideas is not easy, but the real challenge is lies in carrying out ideas through a practical product innovation strategy and its embodiment. Problems within design innovation is increasingly facing the state of more complexity and professions, successful design may effectively preserve to have differentiated marketing and design vision organizing capable multidisciplinary teams both inner and outside of cooperate resource.This course may focus on:1.The framework for innovation.2.The model establishment of brand and experimental marketing orientated innovation management with regard to the placement of multidisciplinary team.3.Criteria development for both related knowledge and skills.4.Planning, organizing, implementing, monitoring and evaluating design innovation.5.The need for adoptability in organization.

name.zh: 設計思考與計算思維專題
name.en: Special topics in design thinking and computational thinking

description.zh: 本課程探討以人為本的設計思考與以系統化為基礎的計算思維，如何用以問題解決、系統設計與人類行為理解，包括同理心觀察的人類學方法、創意發展的比喻與類比思考方法、邏輯思維方法、巨大複雜系統設計與評估的工程思維方法，以及複雜性、智能、心理、人類行為的理解的科學思維方法。
description.en: This course is to explore some special topics about the approaches of human-centered design thinking and system-based computational thinking to problem solving, systematic design, and understanding human behavior, including the methods of empathy observation, metaphor and analogy, logic, complex systems, artificial intelligence, and psychology.

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題(四)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project(IV)

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。

Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 本課程下學期亦以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，先介紹專利申請之特殊分割程序與改請程序，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之補充與修正、更正、以及分割改請。
description.en: This course will be based on the "Patent Examination Guidelines" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, and introduces the special procedure for patent division application and patent conversion application according to the principle of "formality before substantive examination". Then, in the "substantive examination" section, topics such as the first-to-file rule, unity of invention, the priority of a patent application, amendments of description, claims and drawings,  division of a patent and conversion of a patent will be sequentially discussed.

description.zh: 本課程係接續美國專利法專題(I)之課程。本課程將以新近之美國專利爭訟案件為主，並佐以相關學者對於這些案件之觀點。修習完本課程之學生，除具分析美國專利案能力外，並具美國法律論文之閱讀與理解能力。
description.en: This course is the next course of the U.S. Patent Law Seminar (I). The content will focus on the recent issues on patents, as well as the scholars’ opinions on the issues. Students are expected to have the ability of analyzing of patent cases, as well as the reading of academic papers in law.

name.zh: 專利佈局與專利策略專題研究
name.en: Seminar on Patent Portfolio and Patent Strategy

description.zh: 專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出五十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利範圍解讀開始，熟悉專利的權利範圍，然後介紹專利策略以及佈局的方向，提供專利佈局與專利策略理論及實務經驗。本課程的綱要如下： 1.專利權利項解讀 2.專利侵權分析流程 3.專利迴避設計要件 4.專利策略分析 5.專利佈局實務 6.案例研究
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around. In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies. However, in practice, they perform much less. That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty. This course will start from patent claim interpretation, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies. The outline of this course is given as follows: Patent claim interpretation; Process of patent infringement analysis; Requirements of patent design around; Patent strategy analysis; Practice on patent strategies; and Study on patent cases.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹專利檢索及專利地圖的觀念，課程包含以下兩部分：一、為什麼需要進行專利檢索以及如何有效率地找到相關前案，二、如何建構專利地圖及相關資訊的應用。
description.en: The concepts of patent search and patent map will be introduced in this course. The topics of the course includes: 1. Why it is important to do patent search. 2. How to find a related prior art efficiently, 3. How to construct a patent map and exploit related information.

description.zh: 本課程主要為台灣專利申請之文件，其相關的主題包括：專利之檢索、專利文件之閱讀，以及專利申請書、說明書、申請專利範圍與圖示等之撰寫。
description.en: This course focuses on the prosecution for Taiwan’s patents. The topics will include patent search, reading and drafting about patent specification, claims, figures and son on.

description.zh: 利用光纖來製造雷射與光放大器已經廣泛的應用在各領域，由於光纖具有小的纖核，且光在此介質傳播時，通常具有相當長的傳播距離，此外利用各種鎖模技術所產生的短脈衝或是藉由光放大器，使得在光纖中傳播的光具有相當高的功率或是峰值功率，因此許多非線性光學的現象在光纖中被產生，近來更種新穎的光纖包括利用微結構光纖或稱為光子晶體光纖被廣泛的應用，使得光纖所產生非線性效應更為顯著，本課程將介紹在光纖中各種非線性光學現象產生的原理與其應用。
description.en: Fiber laser and amplifier have been widely used in various fields. Recently, many novel optical fibers including the microstructured fiber or termed photonic crystal fiber are widely used to cause the advance of the generated nonlinear phenomena.  In this course, it will introduce the principle of the generated nonlinear effects and its applications.

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解?水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的96家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解?可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為�電子構裝高分子?電路成像高分子?光電子成像材料?最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電高分子。本課程探討這些材料的合成方法，應用原理以及對未來的展望，作詳細的探討。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the synthesis and application of polymer in optoelectronics.It includes�polymer for electron package?polymer for photoresist?polymer for photoimaging?The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode,and conducting polymer.The synthetic scheme of these material and their application will be fully discussed.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之配置法及統計分析方法和結論，包括一因子、二因子、多因子實驗、完全隨機化法、及直交表、田口式品質工程。以提升實驗效率及品質。
description.en: This course aim to provide students with methods of promoting experimental efficiency. It may include introduction to basic statistical concepts, one-factor experiment, two-factor experiment, multi-factor experiments, completely randomized design, randomized and orthogonal array, Taguchi technique for quality engineering.

description.zh: 服務設計的方法乃是透過相關資源做適當的規劃與組織，已提昇使用者與服務提供者間之服務及互動的品質。其主要的架構與方法乃在於了解使用者的行為、需求及動機後，創造具友善性、競爭性、及相關性的使用者經驗。本課程將以服務設計的概念與方法為核心，以使用者需求及經驗的創造為基礎，探討並分析不同的互動技術的適用情境及其發展與應用領域。
description.en: Service design is the activity of planning and organizing related resources of service in order to improve its quality and the interaction between service provider and users. The backbone of service design methodologies is to understand the behavior of the users, their needs and motivations, so that to create user-friendly, competitive and relevant service to the users. The service design concepts and methodologies and user experience analysis are used in this course for discussing the developments and applications of interactive technologies in the aspects of various scenarios and application fields.

notes: 與資工所合開,修課上限20人

description.zh: 資源工程導論為資源工程的入門學科，其範圍包括天然的金屬、非金屬、礦物與石油、天然氣、建築用砂石、石材與水等原生資源，以及工商業及一般生活的廢棄物或其附帶產生的可再生資源。期對初學者有一整體的基本概念。
description.en: This is a general introduction class to provide student basic knowledge about resources engineering which include metal, nonmetal, minerals, petroleum, natural gas, aggregates, dimension stone and water resources.

name.zh: 電腦整合實體模型設計

description.zh: 1.實體模型設計簡介與應用2.實體模型設計軟體功能與使用者介面之簡介(簡介構成軟體的各項模組)3.建構繪圖環境(訂置繪圖工具列與草圖顯示內容)4.建構參考幾何(繪製草圖，尺寸標註、產生基準面、曲線、曲面等)5.使用特徵(填料、除料、伸長、掃出、旋轉…等的使用)6.組件的繪製(特徵編輯，處理組件的組態…)7.組合件的處理(處理方式、產生組合件、爆炸圖、模型組態、於零組件中註記)8.鈑金零件9.熔接10.工程圖的處理(訂製工程圖範本、產生工程圖、組件與組合件的視圖)11.模型外觀的處理(材質、顏色、光源)12.輸出與輸入檔案的處理
description.en: 1.	Introduction and Applications of solid modeling2.Introduction of functions and user interface of software for solid modeling3.Create working environoment4.Reference geometry5.Using features6.Working with parts7.Working with assemblies8.Sheet metal9.Weldments10.Create engineering drawing11.Out-looking treatment (materials, color, light source,…)12.Importing and Exporting files

name.zh: 自動化光學精密檢測及實習

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

name.en: Special Topics on Surface Analysis for Materials

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD. From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

notes: 管理博與工管碩博合開

description.zh: 1. 光機電3D模型設計簡介與應用2. 3D模型設計軟體功能與使用者介面之簡介(簡介構成軟體的各項模組)3.建構繪圖環境(訂置繪圖工具列與草圖顯示內容)4.建構參考幾何(繪製草圖，尺寸標註、產生基準面、曲線、曲面等)5.使用特徵(填料、除料、伸長、掃出、旋轉…等的使用)6.組件的繪製(特徵編輯，處理組件的組態…)7.組合件的處理(處理方式、產生組合件、爆炸圖、模型組態、於零組件中註記)8.工程圖的處理(訂製工程圖範本、產生工程圖、組件與組合件的視圖) 9.模型外觀的處理(材質、顏色、光源) 10.輸出與輸入檔案的處理。
description.en: 1.Introduction and Applications of 3D modeling, 2.Introduction of functions and user interface of software for solid modeling, 3.Create working environment, 4.Reference geometry, 5.Using features, 6.Working with parts, 7.Working with assemblies, 8.Create engineering drawing, 9.Out-looking treatment (materials, color, light source,…)Weldments, 10.Importing and Exporting files.

description.zh: 1. 概論2. 鐵路變電所設計3. 電力遙控系統4. 電車線系統設計5. 干擾與防護6. 動力車的電力供應7. 動力車的電力控制8. 未來發展
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Railway substation design3. Power remote control system4. Catenary system design5. interference and protection6. Power supply of locomotive7. Power control of locomotive8. Future development

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。    現代製造科技原理，現代製造科技研究方法，個案研究。
description.en: Principles of modern Manufacturing Technology, Research methods on modern    Manufacturing Technology， Case study.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 微加工程序含MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 本課程介紹管理者或一般大眾在作決策時，會產生的心理偏誤。另外，本課程也提供管理者或一般大眾如何避孼心理偏誤，並改善其決策程序。本課程以心理學的角度來探討。
description.en: This course introduces how psychological biases affect individuals’ decision making processes. The psychological biases include excessive optimism, overconfidence, confirmation bias, illusion of control, representativeness, availability bias, anchoring, framing, loss aversion…etc. In addition, this course is also to discuss the related financial literature and apply the psychological theory of individual behaviour to the financial markets.

name.en: Application of Investment Decision and Information

description.zh: 為因應瞬息萬變的金融投資環境，期許學生具備宏觀的投資管理知識，本課程主要本課程結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。課程內容架構包括：(1) 財務與投資學原理；(2) 資料庫的使用；(3) 財務軟體的操作；(4) 財務與投資個案分析。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
description.en: In response to the rapidly changing environment of financial investments, expecting that students have knowledge of macro investment management, this course combines information and software tools to use, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics include the following: (1) principles of investments, (2) financial database, (3) financial software, and (4) case study in investments. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

name.zh: 高分子材料與複合材料

description.zh: 授課內容包括高分子及複合材料的製程、結構及性質等綜合知識，首先介紹機械混練與接枝共聚合等基本製程方法，並探討交穿網狀高分子合膠材料，以及含浸顆粒狀、纖維狀、板狀等強化高分子複合材料的結構形態與工程性質之相關原理。
description.en: Synthesis, morphology and engineering behavior of polymer and composite materials. Mechanical blend alloys, block and graft copolymers, interpenetrating polymer networks, polymer impregnated particulate, fiber and sheet-reinforce polymeric composites are emphasized.

description.zh: 作業研究是用來處理將有限資源分配於許多競爭性活動的問題上之一種有用的技術，它已經變成眾多企業工業機構的一種標準工具。基於線性規劃的基本知識高等作為研究提供一些有及可靠的運等方法來所決非線性規劃問題及機率模式。一些與實際應用有關的課題諸如有貨理論、等程理論、可靠度及決策理論等將在本課程中以討論。
description.en: This course discusses linear programming, network analysis, dynamic programming, game theory, (non) integer programming, Markov chains (Markovian decision process), queuing theory, inventory models, forecasting models, decision analysis and simulation.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(一)

description.zh: 本課程提供學生養成基本日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life.In addition , using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

notes: A班/建議「無」日文基礎者修讀

name.zh: 國際觀培養:基礎西班牙語1(A1上)

description.zh: 本課程專為初學西班牙文之學生設計，毋需任何西班牙文基礎。本課程著重在學習西班牙文發音及了解基礎文法架構。課程結束前，學生將可以閱讀基本的西班牙文文句、自我介紹及西班牙文的基礎對話。
description.en: This is course is designed for first time students of Spanish. No previous knowledge is required to enroll this course. The focus of this course is to provide a basic knowledge of the pronunciation and grammatical structures of Spanish at the beginner level. By the end of this course, the student will be able to read basic texts in Spanish, self-introduce himself and start a basic conversation.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:基礎西班牙語2(A1下)

description.zh: 本課程專為初學西班牙文之學生設計，毋需任何西班牙文基礎。本課程著重在學習西班牙文發音及了解基礎文法架構。課程結束前，學生將可以閱讀基本的西班牙文文句、自我介紹及西班牙文的基礎對話。
description.en: This is course is designed for first time students of Spanish. No previous knowledge is required to enroll this course. The focus of this course is to provide a basic knowledge of the pronunciation and grammatical structures of Spanish at the beginner level. By the end of this course, the student will be able to read basic texts in Spanish, self-introduce himself and start a basic conversation.

notes: 優先開放修畢基礎西班牙語1

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(二)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Japanese Ⅱ

description.zh: 本課程為日語與文化(一)之進階課程，提供學生養成進階日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course is designed for students who has basic Japanese knowledge or who passed the language course: Japanese (I) in the previous term. This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life. In addition, using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

notes: 開放修畢日語(一)或有基礎者

name.zh: 國際觀培養:躍進新南向
name.en: Feast for the global perspective - Engaging Southeast Asia

description.zh: 本課程邀請校外之社會、政治、經濟、文化等專家學者與莘莘學子們相互交流，以「跨文化新視野」、「新南向政策議題」、「東南亞與臺灣之關係」等主題進階探討，培養學生世界公民之意識，提升學生跨文化溝通能力、適應全球化生活與國際競爭力。
description.en: Domestic speakers and outstanding scholars are invited to deliver cross-cultural lectures, sharing their knowledge and experiences with the students. Based on the New Southbound Policy, the themes of the lectures will be focusing on the Southeast Asian countries in terms of social, cultural, political and economic studies. Students are expected to be inspired to strengthen their independent thinking and global perspective and engage with issues regarding Southeast Asia.

name.zh: 創新講座-創意與創新思維(二)

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產官學界專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創意與創新思維之實例教學，使學生能儘早瞭解企業創新之模式及相關理論，以啟發學生之創意，促進學術與產業之互動與交流，縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course conducts the instances teaching of creativity and innovate thinking by invite industry, government and academic experts to give lectures and forums. The mine objective is to enable students to understand about the innovation model and related theories of enterprises as soon as possible, and to inspire students’ creativity. Furthermore, promote interaction between academic and industry; and to shorten the distance between academic and industry.

notes: 工設四與創新所、最後一哩合開；3/1.3/15-4/19，上6週

name.zh: 投資決策方法與交易技巧

description.zh: 本堂課邀請大富資訊各領域投資達人，從總經訊息剖析、產業趨勢分析、財務及商業分析投資選股、期權衍生性商品投資策略及套利避險實戰技巧，為台北科技大學學生分享其業界多年的寶貴心得。財富自由是每個人所企求的，如何於在學期間培養好的投資理財觀念及交易技巧，一方面可降低未來步入職涯後財富大幅縮水的風險，另一方面或許可成為步入職場的利器，甚至可能是邁向財富自由的另一助力。
description.en: This class is going to invite investment experts from FORTEK COMPUTER CO  to teach the students by sharing their practical experience in the finance industry. The contents include macroeconomic information analysis, industry trend analysis, financial statements analysis, investment strategies of futures and warrants, as well as experience sharing of trading techniques. Everybody wants to achieve financial independence; therefore it is important to have the right concept of investments and trading techniques. The purpose of this course is, on the one hand, help students reduce the risk of financial loss due to lack of financial knowledge. On the other hand, for those students who are interested in financial industry, this course offers practical training and may help students to find good financial-related jobs in the future. Also, it may help students to achieve the goal of financial independence.

notes: 經管大碩與最後一哩合開

name.en: Entrepreneurship Practices: The Apprentice in NTUT

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生創新創業的實務，讓學生實際組成團隊進行創業，並有老師全程指導實踐創業，學校並提供基本創業基金與創業場地，輔導學生實際體會創業的過程。課程內容包括：創新創業精神、創新思考、自我了解、團隊組成、經營模式建立、創業財務、創業專題進行、創業競賽等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students to practice the entrepreneurship and innovation. Students will form an entrepreneurship team. Teacher will guide the students throughout the entrepreneurship processes. University will offer students initial funds and incubation assistances. Students will gain practical experiences on how to establish entrepreneurship. The contents include entrepreneurial thoughts and actions, design thinking, self-understanding, team formation, business model development, entrepreneurship finance, entrepreneurship practices, entrepreneurship contests, and so on.

notes: 經管系所、資財系所與最後一哩合開/需通過審核方能選

name.zh: 國際貿易實務與關務解析(二)
name.en: Application of international trade and customs declaration resolution II

description.zh: 目的：協助同學通過我國「關務特考」、「報關專責人員特考」、「國際貿易大會考認證考試」等國家考試中「國際貿易」之相關考科。內容：解析國內國家考試「關務實務」之命題趨勢。並以實際國際貿易中實務操作為案例，在解題過程中引導學生建立完整的會計理論體系，增進學生對會計理論的理解與應用能力，培養學生的邏輯思考、並增進解題技巧，順利通過國家考試。
description.en: Purpose: To assist students to pass the relevant examinations of "International Trade", such as " National Special Examination for Customs Specialized personnel", " National Special Examination for Customs Officers", "International Trade Examination for IEAT" and other national examinations.Content: By introducing the practical applications to the students, which guiding students to get a full understanding of International Trade Practice System while solving the problems by using real cases. It reinforces students’ knowledge and understanding on the International Trade, and helps students to think logically and also increases their problem-solving skills that help students to pass the national examinations successfully.

notes: 經管大碩與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高等應用統計的相關原理方法與應用案例，包括一般資料分析、信度效度、迴歸分析、主成分分析、多元尺度分析、區別分析、抽樣調查等。課程將配合個案進行討論。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students understand the data analysis and applications. The major contents include reliability and effectiveness of data, regression analysis, principle component analysis, multi-dimensional scaling, logistic analysis and sampling analysis. The course will also include some practical example discussions.

name.zh: 室內設計及施工實戰分析(一)
name.en: Interior Design and Construction actual analysis(一)

description.zh: 室內設計是對建築內部環境的再創造，以美觀和實用為原則。不論是住宅或商業空間，其涵蓋的知識領域包含空間動線、平面配置、色彩計畫、材料挑選、照明分佈，還有機電、空調、法規分析…等應用多元、變化豐富的一門學問。本課程從概念分析到實務案例分析，使學生儘早了解室內設計實務及相關理論，為進入職場預先做準備。
description.en: Interior design is to recreate the interior environment of the building, with the principle of aesthetics and practicality. Whether it is a residential or commercial space, it covers the areas of knowledge including space dynamic line, plane configuration, color planning, material selection, lighting distribution, as well as electromechanical, air-conditioning, regulatory analysis ... and other applications of diversity, a rich variety of knowledge. This course from the concept analysis to the practical case analysis, enables the student to understand the interior design practice and the related theory as soon as possible, prepares in advance for enters the workplace.

notes: 工設系,創新所與最後一哩合開(3/21,5/16在共科演講廳)

description.zh: 使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department. Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included

description.zh: 1.無線通訊系統簡介2.蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹3.無線電通訊的傳播原理4.行動通訊之調變技術5.行動通訊之多工技術6.天線﹑多元性與系統分析7.行動通訊之數位與語音編碼8.無線網路系統9.行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
description.en: 1.Introduction to wireless communication systems2.An Overview of cellular systems3.Mobile Radis Propagation(path loss,multipath     fasing,propagation models)4.Modulation techniques for mobile communications5.Multiple access techniques for mobile communications6.Antenna,dirersity and link analysis7.Channel coding and speech coding8.Wireless networking9.Wireless systems standards and further developments

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

description.zh: 本課程提供需從事實驗研究的學生有關符合統計精神的實驗設計概念，包括確認獨立變項、相依變項、無關變項，以及實驗中隨機抽樣與相關統計的方法。實驗設計包括下列相關活動：1.形成統計假設，2.決定實驗情境；3.確立所需樣本數量。
description.en: An experimental design identifies the independent, dependent, and nuisance variables and indicates the way in which the randomization and statistical aspects of an experiment are to be carried out.  It refers to a plan for assigning subjects to experimental conditions and the statistical analysis with the plan.  The design of an experiment to investigate a scientific or research hypothesis involves a number of interrelated activities: 1. Formulation of statistical hypothesis, 2. Determination of the experimental conditions to be used, and 3. Specification of the number of subjects required.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。    現代製造科技原理，現代製造科技研究方法，個案研究。
description.en: Principles of modern Manufacturing Technology, Research methods on modern    Manufacturing Technology， Case study.

description.zh: 使學員瞭解Python程式語言於機器學習應用，以及機器學習的理論背景、評估如何使用適當的演算法於實際例子、內容包括回歸分析於資料預測、資料維度減少方法於資料特徵提取、資料分類方法包括支援向量機與類神經網路方法。課程主要配合Python例子增進學員了解機器學習的相關知識與提升在資訊處理時代之競爭力。
description.en: Students should be familiar with the basic concepts of machine learning (ML), probability theory, probability distribution, ML algorithms for classification, regression, and clustering taught in this class.

notes: 機電所與自動化所合開

description.zh: 公司治理在商業的過程中扮演核心角色，提供公司目標及策略上的協助並助其達成期望。也提供讓員工共事的價值觀即確保企業永續經營的收支平衡。在現階段競爭時代當中，本課程除提供同事專業知識外，並以此讓學生瞭解企業運作之道。 ◆公司治理定義與演進 ◆公司治理關鍵議題 ◆公司治理演進 ◆公司治理模式 ◆公司治理架構 ◆公司治理應用 ◆公司治理維持與發展。
description.en: Corporate governance is the combination of legal and political governance mechanisms external to the firm, along with monitoring and incentive governance mechanisms internal to the firm, linked and driven by the forces of investment markets, to produce value-increasing outcomes for firms' owners and, ultimately, society at large. In this course, we will survey corporate governance, taking the investor's point of view. By the end of the course, you should have a well-informed understanding of the basic corporate governance problem and the major issues in corporate governance, prominent proposed solutions to the corporate governance problem, the way the problem is actually addressed in a variety of companies and countries, and evidence on the prospects for and drawbacks of the various solutions. This course is therefore comprised of distinct intellectual components-the practice and the science-which are intertwined throughout the semester's activities.

name.en: Period Studies in Literature and Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨為引導學生研究自20世紀初到第二次世界大戰西方文學的觀點。藉由閱讀現代主義者所創作的詩詞、散文及戲劇性文學，欣賞同時期的畫作、電影與音樂，進而研究與討論文學文化以期培養學生的對文學文化的欣賞。
description.en: From the dawn of the 20th century until approximately the time of WWII, a new perspective arose in Western literature and culture. The modernist aesthetic called for new ways of seeing, reading and conceiving the world. Text and visual art changed, both formally and thematically, and a new and enduring art form-cinema-came into being. We will be reading poetry, prose texts and dramatic works by key Modernist figures, viewing paintings and film representative of the era, and listening to a new kind of American classical music-jazz-shape itself from its blues roots. Through exposure to Modernist literature, visual art, music and film, students will be able to acquire a more sophisticated, nuanced view of modernity in its aesthetic expression, and a greater appreciation for the manner in which art and culture continually shape and reshape one another.

description.zh: 幫助學生認識一般科技文章以及科技論文語法、文體、句子結構等，並加強英文口頭表達之能力。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 限博士生修習；機電科所與製科所合開

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括:金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

name.zh: 金融大數據與企業金融
name.en: Big data in finance and corporate finance

description.zh: 本課程含兩個部份。第一部分企業金融的課程著重於討論代理問題對企業融資、投資決策、股利政策、企業價值與績效的影響。第二部分金融大數據課程讓修課學生靈活的運用各種大數據探勘與分析演算法、社群文字探勘及機器學習演算法等技術，分析各項金融資料。透過實際金融數據分析案例及實務資料操做，補強資訊背景學生之金融產業知識，並讓修課同學了解資訊科技於金融資料分析之實務應用，以培育業界金融科技人才。課程內容以模組的方式進行，包括：「數據分析」、「機器學習」以及「金融大數據實務」。課程也將擷取網路中的開放財經數據，進行金融資料之預處理、分析及預測結果之驗證，協助修課學生建構高預測能力及穩定性之數據探勘模型。
description.en: This course consists of two modules. The first module, corporate finance, highlights how agency problems affect firms’ financial and investment decisions, dividend policy, firm value, and performance.The second module, Big data in finance, teaches students to use various techniques of big data mining and analysis algorithms, text mining of social media, and machine learning algorithms to analyze financial data. In this course, by case study, we will strengthen the financial knowledge of information background students. Also, the students can understand how to select and well organize various information technologies. The course is organized in modules, including "Data Analysis", "Machine Learning" and "Big Data Practice for Financial Data analysis." The course will also teach students to collect open financial data from the Internet, and experience the KDD process to establish a prediction model with high forecasting ability and stability.

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括:金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

name.zh: 金融大數據與投資決策
name.en: Financial Big Data and Investment Decision

description.zh: 本課程能夠讓修課學生靈活的運用各種大數據探勘與分析演算法、社群文字探勘及機器學習演算法等技術，分析各項金融資料。透過實際金融數據分析案例及實務資料操做，補強資訊背景學生之金融產業知識，並讓修課同學了解資訊科技於金融資料分析之實務應用，以培育業界金融科技人才。課程內容以模組的方式進行，包括：「數據分析」、「機器學習」以及「金融大數據實務」。課程也將擷取網路中的開放財經數據，進行金融資料之預處理、分析及預測結果之驗證，協助修課學生建構高預測能力及穩定性之數據探勘模型。
description.en: This course teaches students to use various techniques of big data mining and analysis algorithms, text mining of social media, and machine learning algorithms to analyze financial data. In this course, by case study and open software operation (such as R ), we will strengthen the financial knowledge of information background students. Also, the students can understand how to select and well organize various information technologies (particular the data analysis technique) to analyze financial data. The course is organized in modules, including "Data Analysis", "Machine Learning" and "Big Data Practice for Financial Data analysis". The course will also teach students to collect open financial data from the Internet, and experience the KDD process, including: data pre-processing and data analysis, to establish a prediction model with high forecasting ability and stability.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1)了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2)討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3)對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4)將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷,並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析,公司經營財務報表分析,投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 工業4.0為德國聯邦政府在2012年時提出，是德國高科技戰略十大未來計畫之一，其主要精神就是在生產製造過程中，整合運算、通訊與控制的虛實化系統(CPS)，連結物聯網建構「智慧工廠」，形成智慧製造與服務的全新商機與商業模式。工業4.0與智慧製造涵蓋領域甚廣，本課程內容包括：工業4.0概論、智能生產、物聯網及RFID應用、機器人整合製造及製造執行系統等。
description.en: The objective of intelligent manufacturing is to reduce manufacturing cost using information technology including digital control, industrial Robotics, automated inspection, cloud computing, business intelligence, and internet of thing (IOT). This integration allows individual component to exchange information with each other, and manufacturers have the ability to create automated manufacturing processes. In this course, students could learn the basic principle of automation, application of industrial robots, IoT and RFID applications, manufacturing execution system, and lean production.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討數位化經營環境下，企業經營模式及其中策略變革等相關管理議題。課程中包含創新企業經營模式，經營模式方法論，經營策略管理與變革，及各產業於數位化經營環境下，經營策略管理與變革之產業個案研討。
description.en: This course aims to explore management issues related to the business model and strategy change in the digital business environment. The course includes innovative business model, business model methodology, business strategy management and change, as well as various industries in the digital environment, the industry case studies of business strategy management and transformation.

description.zh: 本課程銜接上學期程式交易課程內容(限定修過上學期的同學才能選修)，我們將使用R語言進行更為精實的交易策略建構，包刮K棒分析、指標建構、訊號探勘、資金管理…等。此外，我們下半學期將邀請業師教授XQ程式交易軟體，撰寫XS程式語法進行回測以及模擬下單
description.en: This course connects with the last semester courses “program trading” (limited to last semester students to join). We will use the R language for more sophisticated trading strategy construction, including K-bar analysis, index construction, trading signal exploration, money management, and so on. In addition, we will invite the instructor to teach XQ program trading software in the last half-semester, usingXS program grammar to back-testing trading strategies.

notes: 資財三四與資財所合開

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生金融科技的基本概念，以及創新創新創業的思維與方法，使學生具備金融科技方面的創新創業能力。課程內容包括：金融科技概論、創業思維、設計思考、商業模式、金融科技商業模式、人工智慧、金融大數據、虛擬貨幣、區塊鏈、P2P借貸、第三方交易、群眾募資、P2P匯兌、程式交易、機器人理財等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology, entrepreneurial thoughts, and design thinking to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, financial technology business models, artificial intelligence, financial big data, virtual money, blockchain, P2P lending, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

notes: 資財三四與資財所合開/科研243

description.zh: (1) 探討比較技職教育的意義、發展與研究方法。(2) 介紹主要國家的技職教育制度。(3) 從事比較技職教育問題的分析。
description.en: (1) Examination of concepts, development and research methodology of comparative technical-vocational education.(2) Knowledge in comparison technical-vocational education in Chinese in terms of purpose system and problems with those of selected foreign countries.(3) Analysis of major research regarding contemporary trends and issues in comparative technical-vocational education.

description.zh: 一、射頻網路分析 二、射頻集總元件 三、射頻耦合線圈與變壓器 四、射頻集總元件阻抗匹配 五、射頻分佈元件 六、射頻傳輸線變壓器 七、射頻分佈元件阻抗匹配  八、射頻放大器阻抗匹配
description.en: 1.RF Network Analysis 2.RF Lumped Elements 3.RF Coupled Coils and Transformers 4.RF Impedance Matching Using Lumped Ellements 5.RF Distributed Elements 6.RF Traansmission Line Transformers 7.RF Impedance Matching Using Distributed Elements 8.RF Amplifier Impedance Matching

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.基礎物理光學2.超音波簡介3.雷射超音波的生成4.雷射超音波的偵測5.刀鋒邊緣技術6.雙頻干涉儀7.費里裴洛干涉儀8.非線性晶體干涉儀9.雷射超音波技術於非破壞檢測之應用10.雷射超音波技術於材料性質量測之應用11.雷射超音波技術發展的未來趨勢
description.en: 1.Introduction to physical optics, 2.Introduction to ultrasonic waves, 3.Optical generation of ultrasound waves, 4.Detection of ultrasonic waves with optical methods, 5.Knife edge technique, 6.Hetrodyne interferometers in LUT, 7.Fabry-Perot interferometers, 8.Two-way mixing interferometers, 9.Application of LUT in nondestructive testing, 10.Application of LUT to material characterizations, 11.Future trend of LUT.

name.en: Intellectual Property in Mergers and Acquisitions

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學員掌握(1)併購法規架構、 (2)併購實務、 (3)併購英文，中長目標為：培育併購律師、法務長、財經法官。
description.en: This course is to achieve the following purposes:(1)	To understand the structure of M&A laws.(2)	To be familiar with M&A practice.(3)	To be fluent in M&A EnglishFor the mid-long term goals, this course is to cultivate M&A lawyer, chief legal officer and financial-economic law judge.

name.en: World Poetry and Its Cultural Applications

description.zh: 英國浪漫派詩人雪萊曾說，「詩人為人類立訂法則，雖然他們是沒有獲得認可的立法者」。或許詩人的確尚未普獲認可。但是詩一直是語言藝術中最獨特的一種，充分融合了口語功能和書寫文本的特性，不但兼具了哲學的深度和直接知覺的立即性，更巧妙結合了個人的想像世界和人類共同的文化傳承-神話、民間儀式和風俗。本課程將引導學生跳脫文字，透過討論、表演，以及音樂、電影和視覺藝術等方式進入嶄新的詩的世界。課程重點特別強調世界的詩歌和音樂的密切關聯，尤其是蘇格蘭歌謠、英國和美國的搖滾民謠、雷鬼、藍調、爵士以及嘻哈音樂。相關的則電影包括Dali和Bunuel的「安達魯之犬」、Cocteau的「奧菲斯」，以及 Marcel Camus的「黑人奧爾非」。透過詩、藝術、歌曲、電影、歷史、神話和文學理論等不同管道的薰陶，學生更能夠理解文化中具有美學深度的表達，並掌握其中的細膩和幽微，也就更能進一步深切體認藝術和文化相互形塑的魅力。
description.en: English Romantic poet Percy Bysse Shelley famously observed that "poets are the unacknowledged legislators of mankind."  Unacknowledged they may be.  But poetry remains unique among the linquistic arts as the one which most fully synthesizes orality with the written text, the intellectual rigor of philosophy with the immediacy of direct perception, and the world of the individual imagination with the mythologies, folk rituals and customs held as the common cultural heritage of entire groups of people .In this course we will try to bring the written word off the page and into new life through discussion, performance and the use of supplementary materials such as music, film and visual art. An important feature of the course will provide an examination of poetry in relationship to musics of the world, particularly Scottish ballads, British and American folk-rock, reggae, blues, jazz and hip-hop. Projected films include:  Dali and Bunuel's Andalusian Dogs, Cocteau's Orpheus, and Marcel Ca

description.zh: 此課程旨在因應高階英語文學習者的需要，協助他們得到近乎英美人士的語言知識、瞭解真實世界溝通的詞彙使用方式。關乎創新而主流、重複出現的詞彙變化模式。近年來成長迅速的詞彙語用學，探究詞彙的流動性及其基底修辭功能，諸如意義窄化、擴充、演變、偏離、轉換等現象。
description.en: This course aims to meet the needs of advanced learners of English who are in the pursuit of near-native knowledge and understanding of English lexical use in real-world communication. Lexical pragmatics concerns itself with the creative and at the same time mainstream, re-occurring patterns of lexical variations. The recent rapidly growing area of lexical pragmatics explores lexical dynamics as well as their underpinning rhetorical functions, such as phenomena of meaning narrowing, expansion, evolution, deviation, modification, etc.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(一)

description.zh: 本課程提供學生養成基本日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life.In addition , using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

notes: B班/建議「無」日文基礎者修讀

name.en: Development of global perspective: Korean I

description.zh: 本課程將教導學生韓文字母結構、發音方法及基礎詞彙、文法與句型、韓國現況及文化等，透過文化與語言的習得，培養學生與韓籍人士溝通或在韓國生活所需要的最基本的溝通能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce beginners to basic spoken and written skills in Korean. Students will develop basic skills with a focus on effective communication and enjoyment through listening, speaking, reading and writing. By the end of the course, students will be able to hold a simple conversation in Korean, comprehend basic Korean texts and write about their everyday lives.

name.zh: 高等電腦輔助工程分析

description.zh: 讓學生了解並熟悉工程軟體於工程問題分析之應用，培養解決實務及研發問題的能力。課程概述：在具備固體、熱流等力學及有限元素分析理論的基礎上，利用3D繪圖與高階有限元素分析整合軟體，將工程實務問題作實體建模，並進行物理行為模擬分析與理論驗證，包括靜態、動態、落下測試、穩定性、疲勞、熱傳、非線性、多重物理參數耦合及最佳化等問題之實例演練。最後以實際研發專題作為本課程學習之體驗。
description.en: On the basis of applied mechanics such as the solid, thermal fluid and finite element analysis theory, utilize the computer engineering software, which the 3D computer aided drawing is integrated with finite element analysis, to simulate the practical engineering problem. The physical behaviors such as static, dynamic, dropping testing, stability, fatigue, heat transfer, nonlinearity, coupled multi-physics and optimization, etc. can be verified and predicted through the simulating analysis for several practical model. The course will give both comprehensive experience and knowledge of a special researching topic finally.

name.zh: 複合材料在工程上之應用

description.zh: 本課程旨在傳授學生有關複合材料力學行為之基本觀念，及複合材料在工程上之應用。主要內容有:1.複合材料之簡介2.單薄層複合材料之力學行為3.複層材料之力學4.複合材料在工程上應用
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the srudent to the basic concepts of the mechanical behavior of composite materials as well as their applications in engineering use.The main contents are 1.Introduction to composite materials2.Mechanical behavior of a lamina3.Mechanical behavior of a laminate4.Engineering applications of composite materials

name.zh: 城市災害管理與重建專題
name.en: Special Topics on Urban Disaster Management and Reconstruction

description.zh: 近來全球氣候異常變遷，對人類生活環境影響甚鉅；臺灣是天然災害發生最頻繁的地區，建築與規劃專業人員必需及早養成以規劃設計達到減災防災的災害防救意識與專業素養。本課程目的在強化建築與都市規劃專業對環境變遷與災害防治融入規劃設計知識與應變的能力；藉由國內外文獻探討、個案研究、課程研討與專家座談等方法，以區域生命共同體觀點，針對建築及都市規劃災害管理相關的災害種攞、減災型態的建築計畫與土地使用規劃、災害防救體系、環境變遷及衍生議題、資源配置、複合型災害衝擊、因應氣候變遷之災害調適策略與機制、災後安置、產業復甦與社區重建等有深入的探討，期能藉助設計與規劃保障生命財產安全。
description.en: A huge impact on the human environment occurred by the recent abnormal global climate change. Taiwan locates in one of the most frequent natural disasters areas, architectural and planning professionals are required to develop the disaster prevention and rescue knowledge and profession as soon as possible. The course aims to enhance the ability of architecture and urban planning profession, and understand how environmental change and disaster prevention can be integrated into the planning and design knowledge and training. With the perspective of regional life community to explore disaster management and reconstruction, disaster mitigation of architecture and land use planning, disaster prevention rescue system, environmental changes and derivative issues, resource allocation, compound disaster impact and response to climate changes of the adaptation strategies and mechanism, post-disaster resettlement, industrial recovery and community reconstruction through domestic and international

notes: 日職、設計博所合開，兼任教師：彭光輝

name.en: Special Topics on Urban Disaster Management and Reconstruction

description.zh: 先修課程：統計學基礎統計介紹、一因子、二因子、多因子實驗、完全隨機化法、隨機化區集法、拉丁方格法、及直交表、田口式品質工程。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students with methods of promoting experimental efficiency. It may include introduction to basic statistical concepts, one-factor, two-factor, multi-factor experiments, completely randomized design, randomized block design, Latin square, and orthogonal array, Taguchi technique for quality engineering.

description.zh: 1. 授課目的： 現代都市規劃與建築設計除了永續環境生態之議題外，影響人體最鉅者莫過於健康環境議題，尤其在 SBS、SARS、VI、Urban Terrorism等事件之後。本課程之目的即在於傳述健康環境概念在規劃實務上之應用，並探討其作業技術內容，以培養學生健康建築之檢測、診斷、規劃、設計與施工能力。2. 授課內容： 由基本永續都市中，各項健康議題、技術原理及其指標講授，進而指導實證操作技術實驗並撰寫論文，再而探討其實務應用。3. 作業練習： 本學期藉由專題檢測與實驗操作、改善方案設計、論文報告撰寫，特別著重研討式論辯，訓練學術思辯及技術應用操作能力，以利學生認識健康指標及其設計應用之整體關聯性，進而建立其健康建築規劃設計能力。
description.en: After the incidents of SBS、SARS、VI、Urban Terrorism etc., the most important issues would be the healthy problem in built environment besides sustainability of urban planning and building design. The purposes of this course are, based on empirical survey and experiment, special topics on healthy buildings such as, aerosols, microorganism, electromagnetic waves, sound etc. would be studied. Results for hypothetical approaches, technical solutions and improving measures are to propose, so that the concept and logic for healthy buildings would established.

name.en: Machine Vision and Image Processing Algorithm

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹機器視覺之基本觀念與系統設計、組成機器視覺系統之元件 (攝影機、鏡頭及照明設備等)、重要之照像幾何學與立體測量法，同時介紹二位元影像處理、視覺對準法則、相機校正法、計算視覺與打光技術等重要基礎知識，配合影像處理演算法之介紹，使學員建立完整之機器視覺基礎與概念。(本課程參考麻省理工學院(MIT)之開放式課程)將包含下列主題:o 影像之形成 (Image Formation)o 視覺系統設計 (Vision System Design)o 移動中視覺 (Motion Vision)o 陰影成像法 (Shape from Shading)o 二位元影像處理 (Binary Image Processing)o 照像測量法 (Photogrammetry)o 立體影像 (Stereo Vision)o 對準法則 (Object Representation Alignment)o 相機校正法 (Camera Calibration)o 計算視覺 (Computational Vision)o 打光技術 (Optical Illumination)o 機器視覺之應用 (Applications to robotics and intelligent machine
description.en: This subject provides an introduction to the process of generating asymbolic description of an environment from an image and the fundamentals ofmachine vision and image processing techniques. Lectures include the followingtopics:※ The physics of image formation,※ Vision System Design,※ Motion vision,※ Recovering shapes from shading,※ Shape from Shading,※ Binary image processing,※ Photogrammetry,※ Stereo Vision,※ Object representation alignment,※ Camera Calibration,※ Computational vision,※ Optical Illumination,※ Applications to robotics and intelligent machine interactionTextbook:Horn, Berthold K. P., Robot Vision. Cambridge, MA: MIT Press/McGraw-Hill,March 1986. ISBN: 0262081598.

name.en: Design and Practice of Integrated Circuit Layout

description.zh: 本課程將介紹layout(佈局)和先進製程的密切關係，從佈局設計流程之基本觀念及 EDA 軟體的使用到更深入探討 layout 的架構設計和先進製程中layout遇到的瓶頸和困難；課程內將教授並探討不同實務架構的layout問題和解決方法，其中包含標準電路元件(Standard cell)、記憶體 (Memory) 、類比暨混合信號 (Analog and mixed signal)，最後透過本課程的期末報告練習，可了解實務界中layout design的挑戰和對未來先進製程的重要性並提升學生往後在業界的競爭力。
description.en: Integrated circuit (IC) layout design plays a big role in the current semiconductor industry, especially for the most advanced technology. This course explores the big task of IC layout design and the practical problems with solutions in different layout fields, such as standard cell design, memory design, analog design, and mixed-signal field. This course introduces the students to the process, tools, and methodology of IC layout design. Moreover, it also provides the students with the insight into the exciting field of semiconductor technology and electronic devices. By going through the final project and competition, students will be brought to the next level of layout field and will have a wider vision to realize IC layout design.

notes: 電機所、電子所與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程從社會、藝術、環境、哲學思想與文化等角度剖析二十世紀後地景建築所呈現的各種面向。課程含蓋：一、當代地景建築的前身、萌芽與趨勢。二、當代主要思潮與地景建築的詮釋。三、當代地景建築師和作品之批評與研討。
description.en: This course pinpoints on various aspects of landscape architecture from the 20th century onwards. Social, artistic, environmental, philosophical, and cultural viewpoints involved along the flow of contemporary landscape architecture are to be included. Contents consists of:   1 The germs, predecessors and trends of contemporary landscape architecture.   2 Contemporary interpret on landscape architecture.   3 Critics and Seminars on landscape architects and works of contemporary significance.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程從社會、藝術、環境、哲學思想與文化等角度剖析二十世紀後地景建築所呈現的各種面向。課程含蓋：一、當代地景建築的前身、萌芽與趨勢。二、當代主要思潮與地景建築的詮釋。三、當代地景建築師和作品之批評與研討。
description.en: This course pinpoints on various aspects of landscape architecture from the 20th century onwards. Social, artistic, environmental, philosophical, and cultural viewpoints involved along the flow of contemporary landscape architecture are to be included. Contents consists of:   1 The germs, predecessors and trends of contemporary landscape architecture.   2 Contemporary interpret on landscape architecture.   3 Critics and Seminars on landscape architects and works of contemporary significance.

description.zh: 課程目標在教授學生生醫材料與醫療器材技術商品化之實務知識。首先介紹生醫材料產品之特性與市場概況，並由各國醫療法規為出發點，教導學生了解生醫材料產品上市所需之相關程序。特別透過實例之講解，引導學生了解設計、製造、測試三大重點之實務操作。包括產品設計之準則，ISO 13485醫療器材品質系統實務操作，臨床前生物相容測試以及臨床試驗之執行等。課程設計將著重實際法規之講解、實力講解與分析以工廠參觀。將由本校專任教師配合企業講師任教，培育學生迅速進入相關產業工作之能力。
description.en: The objective of this course it to illustrate the commercialization process for biomaterials products. The features and the marketing overview of biomaterials will be introduced first. The regulatory issues and the necessary procedures for the commercialization process will be introduced. By the case studies, it is designed to train the students about the necessary concepts of product design, manufacturing and testing processes. It consists of the product design guidelines, ISO 13485 medical products GMP, pre-clinical and clinical tests.

description.zh: 先修課程：動態分析與模擬或負責教授同意。  非線性系統現象介紹，參數影響及應用模擬方法，數值分析及案例研究。
description.en: Nonlinear phenomena, Effects of parameters, Simulations and analyses, Case study.

description.zh: 石油地質組著重於石油探勘中長期的效益，以提高探勘成功率為宗旨，作先導性之研究，支援現場單位解決地層對比、岩相組織、有效孔隙的問題。盆地分析、石油系統的研究、加強礦區經濟分析，提供探勘策略，促使降低探勘風險。
description.en: Principles of origin, migration, and accumulation of oil and gas. The laboratory introduces the procedures used for exploration, and development of hydrocarbon resources.
